short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows different marketplace prices and profit on Amazon product pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Your Shopping Strategy with the Eronware Amazon Arbitrage Extension
This handy tool allows you to compare prices across Amazon marketplaces (Brazil, Mexico, Canada, USA, UK, Australia, and UAE) and seize the most profitable deals. It also converts selected product prices into USD, calculates your profit amount and percentage, and helps manage warehouse costs.

Key Features:

✜ Display Selected Marketplace Prices in USD: Instantly convert and view prices in USD from the selected Amazon marketplace.

✜ Price Difference Percentage: Easily view and analyze the price differences between marketplaces.

✜ Fba Cost in USD: Instantly convert and view prices in USD fba cost.

✜ Warehouse Cost: Input a default warehouse cost to manage your expenses, and easily update this value directly on the screen.

✜ Profit Amount and Percentage Calculation: Instantly calculate the profit amount and percentage of the product to make the best decisions.

✜ Go to Product Button: Use the button to go directly to the product page in the selected marketplace.

✜ "Amazon Selling" Indicator: Check if Amazon is selling the product, providing insights on competition directly within the extension.

✜ "Find Supplier on Alibaba" Button: Open a page to find suppliers for the product on Alibaba, connecting you with sourcing options instantly.

✜ ASIN Collector: Easily manage products by collecting ASINs from the application’s popup screen.

✜ Estimated Sales: View estimated sales figures for the selected product and estimate your potential earnings.

✜ Default Cost Selection: Set and manage default cost values separately for different marketplaces.

How to Use:

Install the extension and visit any Amazon product page. The extension will automatically display prices, profit margins, and warehouse costs from your selected marketplace. Additionally, you can view estimated sales figures and ASIN details to optimize your shopping experience.

To use the extension, you need to create an account at www.eronware.com. After creating an account, you can access the full functionality of the extension and benefit from all its features.

Download the Eronware Amazon Arbitrage Extension now to better analyze opportunities on Amazon and optimize your shopping!
